instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install 'nativewind' and 'tailwindcss' if not present, as the design relies on utility classes.
3. Create a 'MyShop' stack navigator in the existing navigation structure.
4. Implement 'Discounts', 'Timings', 'Shop QR', and 'Promote' screens as detailed in the 'components' section.
5. Ensure high contrast and large touch targets for the target audience (Indian vendors).
6. Use 'react-native-gifted-charts' for analytics in 'Promote' and 'Discounts' dashboards.
7. Mock data for all screens initially.
8. Follow the 'Anti-AI Designer' persona: Avoid generic layouts, use bold spacing and typography.
10. Respect the directory structure: put new screens in '/app/frontend/app/(main)/myshop/'.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use default 'SaaS Blue'. Use the defined Indigo #6366F1.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures or noise overlays can be used for 'Promote' cards to make them pop.
Never use generic AI emojis for icons.
Use 'sonner' for toasts if available, or a custom accessible toast component.
